Author: lemonye
Text: You will be ok, i promise. You can wear some sort of flowy beachwear, and you can choose a bathing suit if it makes you more comfortable, but you will look bomb dot com in a bikini! Choose one that fits you well, ill fitting clothes are the worst. And think about why youâ€™re there, to spend time with people who care about you. Other people at the beach are too worried about themselves to even think about your appearance.
